name: Spider Eyes
description:
Spider eyes is a traditional turn-based Roguelike where you can see the future once using "The eye" to plan your next move then kill an enemy to see the future again and again and again...

Controls: 

WASD to move.
SPACE to use "The eye".
Mouse left click to shoot spider web

The team:

@Abdullahzeer27 - Programming & mechanics design.
@Nash_Visuals - Art & level design.

Sorry our game is really buggy but we hope that you enjoy it :)
